item.content:encoded:
Outsprint Store: Design tools for public good

At Outsprint, we believe in the power of human-centered design for creating public good and social impact. Having done many projects with government agencies and non-profit organisations, we developed many tools along the way. Tools to help us shed light on public and social issues around employment, technology, government-citizen relationships, and more. Tools that others have asked us to share. We thought, “Why let these tools go to waste, after a project is done?” So here they are. Check out the store.

The post Outsprint Store: Design tools for public good appeared first on Outsprint.
